line_work_sets.title: Extended Basic Stances
line_work_sets.description: Refined stance work building on 10th keup fundamentals

direction_pattern.description: Step forward maintaining perfect attention stance posture
Step backward in attention stance, focus on heel alignment

techniques.name: Ready Stance (Extended Practice)

direction_pattern.description: Step forward into ready stance with consistent foot positioning
Step backward into ready stance, maintain shoulder width

common_mistakes: Feet too close or too wide

line_work_sets.title: Extended Basic Blocks
line_work_sets.description: Building on fundamental blocks with enhanced form and power

techniques.name: Low Block (Extended)

direction_pattern.description: Step forward in walking stance, execute low block with opposite arm
Step backward in walking stance, execute low block with opposite arm

common_mistakes: Block too high - should protect low targets
Using inner forearm instead of outer

techniques.name: Middle Block (Extended)

direction_pattern.description: Step forward in walking stance, execute middle block with opposite arm
Step backward in walking stance, execute middle block with opposite arm

key_points: Block finishes at solar plexus level
common_mistakes: Block too high or low for middle section

line_work_sets.title: Extended Basic Strikes
line_work_sets.description: Fundamental striking techniques with improved power and accuracy

direction_pattern.description: Step forward in walking stance, execute straight punch with opposite arm
Step backward in walking stance, execute straight punch with opposite arm

practice_notes.warmup: Complete basic warmup with emphasis on stance transitions and arm swings for blocking motions
focus_areas: Develop stronger blocking techniques with proper body mechanics
Enhance punching power through hip rotation
practice_notes.progression: Focus on form refinement and building muscle memory for consistent technique execution
